title: Power Analysis: How Niewiadoma Survived Vollering’s Alpine Onslaught to Win the Tour de France Femmes
content:
We dig through the data to reveal how Vollering was possibly just a few watts short of successfully defending her title Sunday in the Alps.

Read the full article at Power Analysis: How Niewiadoma Survived Vollering’s Alpine Onslaught to Win the Tour de France Femmes on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
